verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab<WH4124> by the Jordan<WH3383> at Jericho<WH3405>, saying<WH559>,

Command <WH6680> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, that they give<WH5414> unto the Levites<WH3881> of the inheritance<WH5159> of their possession<WH272> cities<WH5892> to dwell in<WH3427>; and suburbs<WH4054> for the cities<WH5892> round about<WH5439> them shall ye give<WH5414> unto the Levites<WH3881>.
And the cities<WH5892> shall they have to dwell in<WH3427>; and their suburbs<WH4054> shall be for their cattle<WH929>, and for their substance<WH7399>, and for all their beasts<WH2416>.

And the suburbs<WH4054> of the cities<WH5892>, which ye shall give<WH5414> unto the Levites<WH3881>, shall be from the wall<WH7023> of the city<WH5892> and outward<WH2351> a thousand<WH505> cubits<WH520> round about<WH5439>.

And ye shall measure<WH4058> without<WH2351> the city<WH5892> for the east<WH6924> side<WH6285> two thousand<WH505> cubits<WH520>, and for the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> two thousand<WH505> cubits<WH520>, and for the west<WH3220> side<WH6285> two thousand<WH505> cubits<WH520>, and for the north<WH6828> side<WH6285> two thousand<WH505> cubits<WH520>, the city<WH5892> being in the midst<WH8432>. This shall be to them the suburbs<WH4054> of the cities<WH5892>.

And the cities<WH5892> which ye shall give<WH5414> unto the Levites<WH3881>, they shall be the six<WH8337> cities<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733>, which ye shall give<WH5414> for the manslayer<WH7523> to flee<WH5127> unto<WH5414>: and besides them ye shall give forty<WH705> and two<WH8147> cities<WH5892>.
All the cities<WH5892> which ye shall give<WH5414> to the Levites<WH3881> shall be forty<WH705> and eight<WH8083> cities<WH5892>; them shall ye give with their suburbs<WH4054>.

And concerning the cities<WH5892> which ye shall give<WH5414> of the possession<WH272> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, from the many<WH7227> ye shall take many<WH7227>; and from the few<WH4592> ye shall take few<WH4592>: every one<WH376> according<WH6310> to his inheritance<WH5159> which he inheriteth<WH5157> shall give<WH5414> of his cities<WH5892> unto the Levites<WH3881>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH5674>, When ye pass over the Jordan<WH3383> into the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>,

then ye shall appoint<WH7136> you cities<WH5892> to be cities<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for you<WH7523>, that the manslayer that killeth<WH5221> any person<WH5315> unwittingly<WH7684> may flee thither<WH5127>.

And the cities<WH5892> shall be unto you for refuge<WH4733> from the avenger<WH1350>, that the manslayer<WH7523> die<WH4191> not<WH5975>, until he stand before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> for judgment<WH4941>.
And the cities<WH5892> which ye shall give<WH5414> shall be for you six<WH8337> cities<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733>.

Ye shall give<WH5414> three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383>, and three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> shall ye give<WH5414> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>; they shall be cities<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733>.

For the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and for the stranger<WH1616> and for the sojourner<WH1616> among<WH8432> them<WH8337>, shall these six cities<WH5892> be for refuge<WH4733>; that every one that killeth<WH5221> any person<WH5315> unwittingly<WH7684> may flee thither<WH5127>.
But if he smote<WH5221> him with an instrument<WH3627> of iron<WH1270>, so that he died<WH4191>, he is a murderer<WH7523>: the murderer<WH7523> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>.

And if he smote<WH5221> him with a stone<WH68> in the hand<WH3027>, whereby a man may die<WH4191>, and he died<WH4191>, he is a murderer<WH7523>: the murderer<WH7523> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>.

Or if he smote<WH5221> him with a weapon<WH3627> of wood<WH6086> in the hand<WH3027>, whereby a man may die<WH4191>, and he died<WH4191>, he is a murderer<WH7523>: the murderer<WH7523> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>.
The avenger of blood<WH1818> shall himself put the murderer<WH7523> to death<WH4191>: when he<WH1931> meeteth<WH6293> him<WH1931>, he shall put him to death<WH4191>.
And if he thrust<WH1920> him of hatred<WH8135>, or hurled<WH7993> at him<WH6660>, lying in wait, so that he died<WH4191>,

or in enmity<WH342> smote<WH5221> him with his hand<WH3027>, so that he died<WH4191>; he that smote<WH5221> him shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>; he is a murderer<WH7523>: the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> shall put the murderer<WH7523> to death<WH4191>, when he meeteth him<WH6293>.
But if he thrust<WH1920> him suddenly<WH6621> without<WH3808> enmity<WH342>, or hurled<WH7993> upon him anything<WH3627> without lying in wait<WH6660>,

or with any stone<WH68>, whereby a man may die<WH4191>, seeing<WH7200> him not<WH3808>, and cast<WH5307> it upon him<WH4191>, so that he died, and he was not his enemy<WH341>, neither sought<WH1245> his harm<WH7451>;
then the congregation<WH5712> shall judge<WH8199> between the smiter<WH5221> and the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> according to these ordinances<WH4941>;

and the congregation<WH5712> shall deliver<WH5337> the manslayer<WH7523> out of the hand<WH3027> of the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818>, and the congregation<WH5712> shall restore<WH7725> him to his city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733>, whither he was fled<WH5127>: and he shall dwell<WH3427> therein until the death<WH4194> of the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548>, who was anointed<WH4886> with the holy<WH6944> oil<WH8081>.
But if the manslayer<WH7523> shall at any time<WH3318> go<WH3318> beyond the border<WH1366> of his city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733>, whither he fleeth<WH5127>,

and the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> find<WH4672> him without<WH2351> the border<WH1366> of his city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733>, and the avenger<WH1350> of blood<WH1818> slay<WH7523> the manslayer<WH7523>; he shall not be guilty of blood<WH1818>,

because he should have remained<WH3427> in his city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> until the death<WH4194> of the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548>: but after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of the high<WH1419> priest<WH3548> the manslayer<WH7523> shall return<WH7725> into the land<WH776> of his possession<WH272>.
And these things shall be for a statute<WH2708> and ordinance<WH4941> unto you throughout your generations<WH1755> in all your dwellings<WH4186>.

Whoso killeth<WH5221> any person<WH5315>, the murderer<WH7523> shall be slain<WH7523> at the mouth<WH6310> of witnesses<WH5707>: but one<WH259> witness<WH5707> shall not testify<WH6030> against any person<WH5315> that he die<WH4191>.
Moreover ye shall take<WH3947> no ransom<WH3724> for the life<WH5315> of a murderer<WH7523>, that is guilty<WH7563> of death<WH4191>; but he shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>.

And ye shall take<WH3947> no ransom<WH3724> for him that is fled<WH5127> to his city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733>, that he may come again<WH7725> to dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776>, until the death<WH4194> of the priest<WH3548>.

So ye shall not pollute<WH2610> the land<WH776> wherein ye are<WH1818>: for blood, it polluteth<WH2610> the land<WH776>; and no expiation<WH3722> can be made for the land<WH776> for the blood<WH1818> that is shed<WH8210> therein<WH1818>, but by the blood of him that shed it<WH8210>.

And thou shalt not defile<WH2930> the land<WH776> which ye inhabit<WH3427>, in the midst of which<WH8432> I dwell<WH7931>: for I<WH3068>, Jehovah, dwell<WH7931> in<WH8432> the midst of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
